title: Default Credential Remediation
description:
An IoT camera on the network still uses admin/admin.

Objective: Identify any devices using factory credentials and enforce unique strong passwords.
dialogue: Mira: "I found a camera still using the default admin password. That's a big risk!"
Mira: "Can you help me find and fix any devices using factory credentials?"
hints: Look up the device's default admin credentials online.
Use Hydra or ssh for testing.
